parts.correct_answer:
Complete the text with the correct words.
Amina loved asking questions about science. Her classmates sometimes became annoyed because she always had dozens of questions. The teacher explained that this was part of her identity and encouraged her to feel proud of it. He also reminded the class that every person is special in their own way, and that being curious helps us to discover new things.
